articles.description: The Kenyan runner continued to separate himself from the world's top male runners. Tigist Assefa won the women's race, and American Keira D'Amato finished sixth.
articles.content:
Even Eliud Kipchoge looked amazed as crossed the finish line Sunday, smashing his world record while winning the Berlin Marathon for the fourth time.
Kipchoge, a 37-year-old from Kenya, captured the… [+3228 chars]

articles.author: Katherine Terrell
articles.title: 'We all have to play better': New Orleans Saints not considering change at QB despite 1-2 start - ESPN
articles.description: New Orleans coach Dennis Allen said Sunday that the 1-2 Saints are not considering a quarterback change despite the team's offensive struggles and inconsistency with veteran Jameis Winston under center.
articles.content:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. -- New Orleans Saints coach Dennis Allen said the team is not considering a quarterback change despite its offensive struggles and inconsistency.
